author: COMSOL
description: This example introduces and demonstrates some important concepts to keep in mind when solving transient acoustics problems. In particular, the example examines the relationship between the frequency content in the excitation, the mesh resolution, and the time step length.
label: gaussian_explosion.mph
name: root
